title: About the human body
brief_description: A young boy who goes to a doctor’s office for a physical examination is told about the more important body systems. Explains, using animation, the functions and uses of bones, ligaments and muscles, and demonstrates the working of the nervous, respiratory, digestive and circulatory systems.
